channel.title: Electrum update
channel.description:
Hello community,
when i run that command to upgrade Electrum:
> Blockquote sudo apt install --install-recommends electrum output is:
> Blockquote reading package lists... Done Building dependency tree... Done Reading state information... Done electrum is already the newest version (4.0.9-1). electrum set to manually installed. 0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.
but when i run Electrum wallet it says that there is new update available which is : 4.2.1
how to solve it please?

item.title: Electrum update
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
About the electum update notification, a new wiki chapter was written just now, see:
Application Specific Update Indicators

Specifically on electrum version numbers:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Electrum#Version_Numbers

Generic instructions to install a newer software versions, updated just now:
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Install_Software#Install_Newer_Software_Versions

These specific instructions on how to manually install a newer version of electrum (if you still need after reading all of above):

Whonix – 19 Apr 22

How-to: Use Electrum Bitcoin Wallet in Whonix ™ - Manual Installation

How-to: Use Electrum Bitcoin Wallet in Whonix

(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

Read full topic

item.title: Electrum update
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Prerequisite knowledge: refer to the Frozen Packages entry in the Operating System Software and Updates chapter.

Read full topic

item.title: Electrum update
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Because whonix using the package which is shipped by debian:

packages.debian.org

Debian -- Details of package electrum in bullseye

Easy to use Bitcoin client

So whenever there is an upgrade from debian then whonix going to get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Electrum update
item.dc:creator: Cottonwoodhill
item.description:
I also don’t understand why I don’t have the latest version which is 4.2.2

Tried to update && upgrade but stuck to the oldest version.

Read full topic

item.title: Electrum update
item.dc:creator: gelapir
item.description:
Hello community,

when i run that command to upgrade Electrum:

Blockquote sudo apt install --install-recommends electrum
output is:

Blockquote reading package lists… Done
Building dependency tree… Done
Reading state information… Done
electrum is already the newest version (4.0.9-1).
electrum set to manually installed.
0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.

but when i run Electrum wallet it says that there is new update available which is : 4.2.1

how to solve it please?

Read full topic
